name: East Midlands Day Ranger
description:
EAST MIDLANDS DAY RANGER Unlimited travel for one day with weekday time restrictions centered around Derby, Nottingham and Leicester. The area extends from Crewe in the west to Peterborough and 
      Lincoln in the east, to Matlock, Alfreton and Worksop in the north and to Leicester, Nuneaton and Tamworth in the south. Note that between Grantham and Peterborough the East Midlands Day Ranger is NOT VALID on London North Eastern Railway . Note also that the "East Midlands Day Ranger" area is different from the "East Midlands Rover" area.
